*Alert: True to size : Please follow the size examples below*(EX: Size “Large recommended”;” – Size for 6″ 215 lbs.) (EX:size “medium,” height “5’9″, weight ” 165 lbs.)
Washing Tips: Wash separately, by hand, in cold water. Lay flat to dry and do not dry clean.
For all sports and cold-weather activities, the TSLA Thermal Baselayer Series is designed with the best heat insulation and thermal materials.
[Fleece Lining] The purpose of the micro-fleece lining is to give warmth as well as moisture sensing, quick drying, and two-way air circulation.

Winter Gear designed for Heat insulation, mobility, and 2-Way Moisture Wicking

Body Temperature Protection Fabric

  • Ultimate wind and cold protection
  • Thermal retention while keeping heat in

Specially designed to regulate body temperature n all cold conditions. Body Geometry Fit technology for superior ergonomic performance for indoor and out door activities. Inner Micro-fleeced fabric for insulation and warmth.

MICRO FLEECE LINED

Winter Baselayer is made of specially developed micro fleece. Thermal materials provide enhanced warmth and comfort.

  • Thermal Fabric
  • 4-Way Stretch
  • Breathable

TSLA WINTERGEAR

Thermal fleece lined designed for Warmth

  • Round Neck Design : Optimized for added Heat insulation and comfort
  • Flat-lock seam : Smooth seams that promote excellent comfort and protection.
  • Early recovery :After workout, it will help you get well by controlling blood flow and preventing being swollen.
  • Deodorization function : Deodorization function do not leave us unpleasant smell behind from sweat and dust.

Breathability

Moisture Wicking

2-Way Air Circulation

Upgraded breathability with moisture-wicking fabric. Multi-layers block out the cold while preventing loos of heat from the body.

  • Regulates body temperature
